abstract: Every time I plug in my Sony digital camera to my Mac Powerbook, iPhoto automatically launches. I just want to download my images to view or edit them. How can I fix this?
snippet: Every time I plug in my Sony digital camera to my Mac Powerbook, iPhoto automatically launches. I just want to download my images to view or edit them. How can I fix this?
lead_paragraph: Q. Every time I plug in my Sony digital camera to my Mac Powerbook, iPhoto automatically launches, even though I never use iPhoto for anything. I just want to download my images and edit them with Photoshop or view them with Preview. But every time I have to quit iPhoto. How can I fix this?
